1.0.name: wordpress/quick-bangla-installer
1.0.description: This plugin installs Bengali Bangla Language on wordpress site. Wordpress is now a popular CMS. Many Bangla sites are built with wordpress. This plugin changes locale setting of your site and installs bangala both on Admin Panel and front end of your site. Download and install "Quick Bangla installer" on your wordpress site and enjoy freedom of bangla.
